example.parse: (IP-CND (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (CS 如果)) (VP (VV 说) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (PN 她)) (VP (VV 看) (DER 得) (VP-EXT (VV 出神))))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (PN 那)) (VP (VP (VC 是) (PP (P 因为) (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-SBJ (NN 演出者) (NN 动作)) (VP (VA 化一))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 表演))) (VP (DVP (ADVP (AD 相当)) (DEV 的)) (VP (VA 精彩))))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 可)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VC 是) (VP (PP-PRP (P 为) (NP (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 他们)) (VP (VV 传达) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 信息)))) (VP (MSP 而) (VP (VV 着迷))))))))
